alert.note: Alert for Helena Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:25PM MST until March 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Helena Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most intense snow will fall through this afternoon and evening, then taper off overnight. Highest accumulations will fall along the southern and western parts of the Helena Valley, with lowest accumulations over northern and eastern parts of the valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
